**Consulting & Technical Services for Full Building Condition Assessments**

**Notice of Invitation to Tender (ITT)**

The Canadian Museum of Nature invites qualified service providers to submit a proposal for comprehensive and detailed facility condition assessments for two buildings located within the National Capital Region.

**Project Overview**
The Museum is seeking a service provider to conduct facility condition assessments for its two buildings, namely the Natural Heritage Campus (NHC) and the Victoria Memorial Museum Building (VMMB). The assessments will be conducted in accordance with the Scope of Work outlined in the tender package.

**Key Requirements and Deliverables**

* Comprehensive facility condition assessments for the structural, electrical, mechanical, building envelope, energy efficiency, and exterior landscape components
* Review of existing facility condition reports
* Generation of a detailed report outlining the findings, recommendations, and implementation plan

**Submission Requirements and Instructions**

The Museum will accept electronic bids only via the Bonfire portal at [https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca](https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca). Submissions must be received on or before the deadline and time specified. Hard copies will not be accepted.

**Tender Documents and Registration**

The official source of information for this tender opportunity is the Bonfire portal. All bidders must register on the platform and create an online profile prior to submitting their proposal. Registration and submission are free of charge. For technical assistance, please contact Bonfire's support team at 1-800-354-8010, ext. 2, or submit a request through the portal.

**Business Hours and Contact Information**

For inquiries regarding this contract opportunity, please contact:

* Michelle Garber
* Tel: (613) 566-4240
* Email: [Approvisionnement-Procurement@nature.ca](mailto:Approvisionnement-Procurement@nature.ca)

**Tender Announcement Details**

* Tender Reference Number: CB-973-96830398

* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: March 18, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: April 26, 2024, 4:00 PM EST (Canada)
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 6, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: June 30, 2024

**Procurement Information**

* Procurement Category: Consultancy Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
